items.text: beats the outside edge and raps him on the back thigh as he looks to defend this leg stump ball into the leg side
items.shortText: Cremer to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
items.shortText: Cremer to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: tossed up on off stump, beats the bat on the outside edge as Mashrafe looks to defend
items.postText: Ferdous C: "Nasir will have chance to show what he has learned/rectified recently. Waiting to see how crises is been handled by transforming Bangladesh. "
items.shortText: Cremer to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: short ball outside off and he misses the attempted pull shot by a long way. Too early on that
items.shortText: Jarvis to Nasir Hossain, no run

items.text: is that an edge? Yes it is! Bangladesh sliding rapidly. Offcutter dug in at short of a length and wide outside off. Grips the surface and climbs up as Nasir brings out the late cut. Once again he's through the shot early and the ball kisses the outside edge on the way up. Dips in front of Taylor who scoops it up
items.shortText: Jarvis to Nasir Hossain, OUT

dismissal.text: Nasir Hossain c †Taylor b Jarvis 2 (8b 0x4 0x6) SR: 25.00

items.text: good length on off stump, defended down the pitch
items.shortText: Jarvis to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: full outside off stump, pushed to extra cover on the front foot
items.shortText: Jarvis to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: offcutter on the pads at a good length. Flicked to deep square
items.shortText: Jarvis to Sunzamul Islam, 1 run

items.text: full on middle stump, flicked to midwicket
items.postText:
Simba: "Great fight back from Zim. If they can restrict the Tigers to a score that is below 250 then they are in with a big chance on condition that they do not wilt with the bat! "

Ashan Manatunga: "These Zimbabweans are making life harder for Sri Lankans here.!!!"
items.shortText: Jarvis to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: back of a length and ripping into the mid-riff as he goes on the back foot. Deflected towards short third man off the thigh guard
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, 1 leg bye

items.text: looks like Cremer has his 100th ODI wicket. But we have to wait for confirmation because Mashrafe has reviewed this caught behind decision. This straightens in the corridor and he pokes the bat out. There is a slight sound as it passes the bat....and UltraEdge confirms that. He didn't look sure about hitting that, and asked the partner if there was a sound. But there's enough evidence. He's out
items.shortText: Cremer to Mashrafe Mortaza, OUT

dismissal.text: Mashrafe Mortaza c †Taylor b Cremer 0 (8b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.text: nicely timed drive. Meets this full ball on the pitch outside off and drives firmly but mid-off dives to his left to cut that off
items.shortText: Cremer to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: back of a length slider outside off, cut straight to extra cover
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: good length on middle stump, big inside edge to short fine as he looks to defend on the front foot
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off, backs away and cuts it wide of backward point to beat him
items.shortText: Cremer to Sunzamul Islam, FOUR runs

items.text: full toss outside off, looks to drive through cover and gets it out to long-on off the inside half of the bat
items.shortText: Chatara to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: overpitched outside off, driven to sweeper cover on the front foot
items.postText: BRYDEN: "Wow, this game has spiced up significantly. at 147/2 I thought that Bangladesh had already closed the door on Zim but I guess Zim had other ideas... This game is setup up to be an amazing match!!!"
items.shortText: Chatara to Sunzamul Islam, 1 run

items.text: full and wide outside off, chases it and ends up slicing aerially towards sweeper cover
items.shortText: Chatara to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: offcutter, back of a length in the corridor. Waits for it to come on and runs it to third man
items.shortText: Chatara to Sunzamul Islam, 1 run

items.text: offcutter on a length outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
items.shortText: Chatara to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run

items.text: good length and sliding through very low outside off as he hangs the bat out
items.postText: Shifat Ahmed: "Just bat the 50 overs and get something around 220. BD has defended low scores on such pitches before. Good luck tigers"
items.shortText: Chatara to Sunzamul Islam, no run

items.text: good length outside off, pushed to extra cover
items.shortText: Cremer to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: length on middle stump, tapped back to the bowler
items.shortText: Cremer to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: full toss at off, driven expansively towards mid-off
items.shortText: Cremer to Mustafizur Rahman, no run

items.text: length ball outside off, sliding through with the angle. Pushed towards short third man
items.shortText: Cremer to Mustafizur Rahman, 1 run
